A

addScore(int, int) - Method in interface Board
increase a player's score by putting seeds into their score house

B

Board - Interface in <Unnamed>
Board objects represent the state of the Oware board, including the number of seeds in each of the houses and in the two score houses, where captured seeds are placed.

C

clone() - Method in interface Board
override the clone method to copy a board state that can be passed to a player;

E

equals(Object) - Method in interface Board
override equals

F

FileFailedException - Exception in <Unnamed>
 
FileFailedException(String) - Constructor for exception FileFailedException
 

G

Game - Interface in <Unnamed>
Game objects represent the state of the game, including the board, the players, the current player and the history of board states.
GameManager - Interface in <Unnamed>
GameManager objects allow the user to start, load, save and play game(s).
getCurrentBoard() - Method in interface Game
 
getCurrentPlayer() - Method in interface Game
 
getCurrentPlayerNum() - Method in interface Game
 
getGame() - Method in interface GameManager
 
getMove(Board, int) - Method in interface Player
Computer player moves should take less than one second to complete the getMove method or they forfeit the game.
getResult() - Method in interface Game
 
getScore(int) - Method in interface Board
find the number of seeds in a player score house
getSeeds(int, int) - Method in interface Board
the number of seeds in the specified house of the specified player.

I

InvalidHouseException - Exception in <Unnamed>
When the house specification is not in the correct range: house 1..6, playerNum 1..2
InvalidHouseException(String) - Constructor for exception InvalidHouseException
 
InvalidMoveException - Exception in <Unnamed>
When a move is against the rules, because of starvation of the opponent.
InvalidMoveException(String) - Constructor for exception InvalidMoveException
 
isComputer() - Method in interface Player
returns true is this is a computer player.

L

loadGame(String) - Method in interface GameManager
Load the game state from the given file.

M

makeMove(int, int) - Method in interface Board
update the board to make a move from the specified house of the specified player
manage(InputStream, PrintStream) - Method in interface GameManager
accept input commands, including LOAD, SAVE, NEW, EXIT from the specified InputStream.

N

nextMove() - Method in interface Game
Get a move from the current player and update the board and current player
NotImplementedYetException - Exception in <Unnamed>
 
NotImplementedYetException(String) - Constructor for exception NotImplementedYetException
 

P

Player - Interface in <Unnamed>
Player objects represent players in the game: they select their move based on the Board they are given and which side of the board they are playing.
playGame() - Method in interface GameManager
Play the current game to completion, returning the playerNum of the winning player (1..2) or 0 if the game ends in a draw.
positionRepeated() - Method in interface Game
 

Q

Save the game state to the given file.
setIn(InputStream) - Method in interface Player
set the input stream for human commands (house numbers and QUIT).
setOut(PrintStream) - Method in interface Player
set the output stream for board state
setScore(int, int) - Method in interface Board
set the number of seeds in a player's score house
setSeeds(int, int, int) - Method in interface Board
set the number of seeds in a house to a given value
sowSeed(int, int) - Method in interface Board
sow a seed in a location: increase the number of seeds already there by one

T

toString() - Method in interface Board
override the toString method to provide a summary of the board state
toString() - Method in interface Game
override the toString method to provide a summary of the game state (including the board)
